adaptive_fields.short_text: Withdraw SNP1 (2 pieces) from shelf A1 and PG1 (2 pieces) from shelf A3
Insert the two PG1 pieces into the holes of the two SNP1 pieces.
adaptive_fields.long_text:
Position the two SNP1 pieces so that the two 'L' shapes are mirrored, meaning, pointing in the same direction. 
 Insert the two PG1 pieces into the cross-shaped holes located at the ends of the SNP1 pieces. The two gray axes should be centered into the two L-shaped pieces
